properties.description: Rewrite label_from_type_and_index() to produce hyphenated labels (user-story --> User-Story-5). Add type_to_label_prefix() helper. Add parse_label_to_type() for reverse operation matching against known types (longest first). Update resolve_link_target() (renamed from _resolve_link_target) to use parse_label_to_type(). Rename _traverse_graph to traverse_graph and _find_incoming_links to find_incoming_links (remove underscore prefix per coding patterns).
